skills.name: Image Formats
skills.pattern: JPEG for photos, PNG for transparency, WebP for web, AVIF next-gen

skills.name: Color Spaces
skills.pattern: RGB, CMYK, HSL, LAB - convert for different uses

skills.name: Resolution & DPI
skills.pattern: 72 DPI web, 300 DPI print, retina 2x/3x

skills.name: Image Compression
skills.pattern: Lossy vs lossless, quality settings, squoosh.app

skills.name: Responsive Images
skills.pattern: srcset, sizes, picture element, art direction

skills.name: Lazy Loading
skills.pattern: loading='lazy', Intersection Observer, blur placeholder

skills.name: Sharp Library
skills.pattern: sharp(input).resize(300).webp().toFile(output)

skills.name: Sharp Resize
skills.pattern: resize({width, height, fit: 'cover/contain/fill'})

skills.name: Sharp Operations
skills.pattern: rotate(), flip(), blur(), sharpen(), grayscale()

skills.name: Sharp Composite
skills.pattern: composite([{input: overlay, gravity: 'southeast'}])

skills.name: Canvas API
skills.pattern: ctx.drawImage(), getImageData(), putImageData()

skills.name: Canvas Filters
skills.pattern: ctx.filter = 'blur(5px) brightness(1.2)'

skills.name: Pixel Manipulation
skills.pattern: imageData.data[i] for RGBA values, iterate pixels

skills.name: Jimp Library
skills.pattern: Jimp.read(path).then(img => img.resize(256).write(out))

skills.name: ImageMagick
skills.pattern: convert input.jpg -resize 50% -quality 80 output.jpg

skills.name: ImageMagick Batch
skills.pattern: mogrify -resize 800x600 -path output/ *.jpg

skills.name: Cropping
skills.pattern: extract({left, top, width, height}), smart crop

skills.name: Watermarking
skills.pattern: Composite with opacity, position, text overlay

skills.name: Thumbnails
skills.pattern: Multiple sizes, square crop, maintain aspect

skills.name: Format Conversion
skills.pattern: toFormat('webp', {quality: 80}), batch convert

skills.name: Background Removal
skills.pattern: remove.bg API, rembg library, U-Net models

skills.name: Image Classification
skills.pattern: TensorFlow.js, mobilenet, custom models

skills.name: Face Detection
skills.pattern: face-api.js, landmarks, expressions, recognition

skills.name: OCR
skills.pattern: Tesseract.js, Google Vision API, structured data

skills.name: Cloudinary
skills.pattern: URL transforms, automatic optimization, AI features

skills.name: Imgix
skills.pattern: URL parameters for resize, crop, filters, faces

skills.name: SVG Manipulation
skills.pattern: SVGO optimization, programmatic generation, animation

skills.name: EXIF Data
skills.pattern: exif-reader, extract camera info, GPS, strip privacy

skills.name: Image Upload
skills.pattern: multer, validation, virus scan, size limits

skills.name: Image Storage
skills.pattern: S3, GCS, local with CDN, organized paths, cleanup
